title: Aspirin Bottle
content:
I was wondering if anyone would be able to identify the following font:   
   
 ![Aspirin Bottle](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526122146im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/36546.jpg)   
   
It reminds me a little bit of Elston RR, and Volvo Broad. But it's not quite the same.   
   
Thanks in advance!
author: antiphrasis

comments.content: The image didn't come through -- can you try posting it again?
Chesh, I can see it all right. Clear your cache?
hmmm... I swear it wasn't there before... it's not just 'cause I'm blotto from lack of sleep, really it isn't.

For a vaguely similar look if you're not after an exact match, you can try [Handel Gothic Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526122146/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/handel-gothic/bold/testdrive.html?s=ASPIRIN&p=72) or Font Bureau's [Agency Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526122146/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/fb-agency/agencyfb-black/testdrive.html?s=ASPIRIN&p=48)

Cheshire Dave,   
   
It might have been my server acting up... you can't always rely on it... sorry about that.

James Gareth,   
   
Thanks for the suggestions... those two fonts are pretty similar, but not quite what I'm looking for. Agency is really cool though, I might use that for some project.   
   
Thanks!

I think youï¿½re looking for [Cachet](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526122146/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/cachet/bold/testdrive.html?s=ASPIRIN&p=72)   
   
Edit: Ooops, not an exact match either!!!   
:-(
Storm's [Teuton Fett Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526122146/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/storm/teuton/fett-bold/testdrive.html?s=ASPIRIN&p=60) is a very close one.

Nicolai Kruse: That's a great looking font! Not an exact match though.   
   
Ignacio Martinez: Indeed, this font is very close to the font I am looking for. Probably closest you can get without an exact match. =)   
   
Thank you so much everybody for your help.
